resources.string:
Other than the requirements, this app has 6 awesome features: 

1. Layout is different every time! 

2. Colors are random! 

3. "Refresh" button to generate a new painting. 

4. Share button! 

5. Click a rectangle to change color. 

6. Long-click a rectangle to pick your own color!
Inspired by the works of artists such as Piet Mondrian and Ben Nickolson\n\nClick below to learn more!
